segments.narration: Interoperability enables agents from different vendors and frameworks to work together seamlessly. Through standards like Agent-to-Agent protocol and Model Context Protocol, agents can discover capabilities and collaborate across ecosystem boundaries.

chapters.title: Pillar III: Security, Governance, and Capability

segments.narration: Non-human identity and access management treats agents as first-class digital citizens with their own credentials and permissions. Each agent holds unique keys that unlock specific resources and capabilities.
